text: The modelling found that results may be dependent on the triage test.There is low-certainty evidence showing that after a negative triage test using HPV16/18 genotyping or colposcopy, follow-up screening at 24 months or at 12 months may result in similar benefits, but there may be fewer cancer treatments and lower costs at 24 months.
